messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 5 biohazard aboard Space Station 13. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to bad luck, not more than 15 wire eating mammals have stampeded into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Biohazard has reached critical mass. Station loss is imminent.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: You incompetent fuck wits, space Trump is very upset
